component.text:
Activity - Scenario 1: Determine EIGRP Fine Tuning Commands

EIGRP is taking too long to converge across the congested serial link between Router 1 (R1) and Router 2 (R2). Fine tune the maximum link bandwidth available for EIGRP up to 80% utilization. Drag the command to the appropriate field next to each router. Not all commands will be used. Click Button 2 to continue.

interface s0/0/0
ip bandwidth-percent eigrp 1 80

interface s0/0/1
ip bandwidth-percent eigrp 80 1

interface s0/0/0
ip bandwidth-percent eigrp 80 1

interface s0/0/1
ip bandwidth-percent eigrp 1 80
Correct
You have successfully identified the EIGRP fine tuning commands for this scenario. Click Button 2 to continue.
Incorrect
You have not successfully identified the EIGRP fine tuning commands for this scenario. Please click Reset to try again.
Check
Reset

Activity - Scenario 2: Determine EIGRP Fine Tuning Commands

The serial link between Router 1 (R1) and Router 2 (R2) is experiencing a high error rate and EIGRP is losing its neighbor adjacency. Fine tune the maximum hello interval for EIGRP up to 120 seconds, and the maximum hold timer for EIGRP up to 240 seconds. Drag the command to the appropriate field next to each router. Not all commands will be used. Click Button 3 to continue.

interface s0/0/0
ip hello-interval eigrp 120 1
ip hold-time eigrp 240 1

interface s0/0/0
ip hello-interval eigrp 1 120
ip hold-time eigrp 1 240

interface s0/0/1
ip hello-interval eigrp 1 120
ip hold-time eigrp 1 240

interface s0/0/1
ip hello-interval eigrp 120 1
ip hold-time eigrp 240 1
Correct
You have successfully identified the EIGRP fine tuning commands for this scenario. Click Button 3 to continue.
Incorrect
You have not successfully identified the EIGRP fine tuning commands for this scenario. Please click Reset to try again.
Check
Reset

Activity - Scenario 3: Determine EIGRP Fine Tuning Commands

The serial link between Router 1 (R1) and Router 2 (R2) was recently upgraded to a 2 gigabit IPv6 link. Fine tune the maximum link bandwidth available for EIGRP down to 5% utilization. Drag the command to the appropriate field next to each router. Not all commands will be used.

interface s0/0/0
ipv6 bandwidth-percent eigrp 1 5

interface s0/0/1
ip bandwidth-percent eigrp 1 5

interface s0/0/0
ip bandwidth-percent eigrp 1 5

interface s0/0/1
ipv6 bandwidth-percent eigrp 1 5
Correct
You have successfully identified the EIGRP fine tuning commands for this scenario.
Incorrect
You have not successfully identified the EIGRP fine tuning commands for this scenario. Please click Reset to try again.
Check
Reset
